 2003-00212003-01-24SGC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of HOWARD SAPERS of Edmonton, Alberta, to be a full-time member of the National Parole Board, Prairies Regional Division, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years; and designation of HOWARD SAPERS to be Vice-Chairperson for the Prairies Regional Division of the National Parole Board; effective March 1, 2003.
